name: Technical Machine TS-1
author: Ryo Ueda

attacks.name: Evoluter
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

rule_box: Attach this card to 1 of your Pokémon in play. That Pokémon may use this card’s attack instead of its own.
